column5: Imagine climbing into your tree stand in the dark and bumping into this guy.
pay back is a bugger ..yeah bugger that's a word I would use..not...dang filters..LOL I wonder if the bear is baiting the area with timmies coffee and timbits
Oh they're armed alright. Deadly at close range.
Holy ----!!  That is too funny!  Next they will be wearing camo, and trying to get the "spring human hunt" back!
Thats awesome! What a great shot!!
Are these your photos? Where abouts were they taken?  But most importantly, did you/he/she drop the bear? lol
That's funny..  Great pics.  Where's the pictures of it hangin in your garage??
Who needs coffee when you got that waitin for you.   Art
You know it had to be 2 days before the season opened. You'd swear the animals a read the regs.
Hahahaha, that's priceless HC.  Nice pics!
Are you sure you didn't misunderstand the baiting instructions  The bait goes under the stand not on it.  lol
that would make for a very fast hunt---
What's scary is I think it was tracking human scent.
I'm not against hunting, but it's good to be reminded that the tables can be turned, and that we are a part of nature too.
HA! Great shots. Don't think I could kill a tree'd bear, but if you're hunting for food, drop that sucker and call the season DONE!!!!!!
Of all places    priceless Thanks for sharing HC Leechman
